--- In archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com, stack <stack@a...> wrote:
> There is no such filter in Heritrix currently.  You'll have to
write 
> one.  Do it as a standalone filter or as a DecideRule to include in
a 
> DecidingFilter.  See developer manual for notes on how to write your
own 
> filter.  Study the ARCWriterProcessor for how to get an inputstream
on 
> to the downloaded content or see ExtractorHTML for an example of
running 
> regexes across the downloaded content.
> 

I'll give it a go.  Thanks for the pointers.
